Mixins¶

class mixins.AdminRequiredMixin[source]¶

Mixin to allow access through a view only if the user is a superuser. Can be used with any View.

class mixins.AjaxableResponseMixin[source]¶

Mixin to add AJAX support to a form. Must be used with an object-based FormView (e.g. CreateView)

class mixins.Tex2PdfMixin[source]¶

Mixin to create a .pdf file from a LaTeX template.
